templates.name: Shipping Policy
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, Ontrac or FedEx. Once shipped it will take 4-7 business days domestically and 4-15 business days internationally.

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: We offer 30-day returns for unworn items. Please use our return portal or contact customer service for assistance.
